title: cygan
author: cygan
created_time: October 20, 2023, 05:04:13 PMLast edit: July 16, 2024, 07:23:20 AM by cygan
content: Dear customers, We are thrilled to introduce our latest release : the Timeline card edition Through this edition we aim to keep a tangible record of the evolution of Bitcoin. Each card of this edition will have a BTC face value equivalent to 50‚Ç¨ (0.00196186BTC for this edition), allowing you to track the progress of this magic internet moneyThis edition is also an opportunity for artists in the crypto community to express themselves and share their vision of the crypto universe. Every quarter, we will collaborate with a different artist, offering a diversity of styles and perspectives over time.Each month during the quarter, a new design from this artist will be featured on a series of cards, making each edition limited and collectible. The Timeline edition will be buyer funded. You can load your card if you want to. There is also a special feature with the cards. These were exceptionally created for october with the polymerbit hologramFor this first quarter, the supply will be 42 cards per month. In addition to that, 1 artist proof card will be produced per design, and offered to the artist. We reserve the right to modify and adjust the supply for next quarters, if we see that too many people are not able to get a card. This quarter, we have the pleasure to work with mx12.levins and release the first Timeline card edition for Q4 October 2023.Icarus Timeline Edition 10/2023 (designed by comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: glad to see this happen - I was planning something very similar but not starting until Jan 2024 - now I think I should cancel mine as it would be redundant and seem somewhat of a copy.I will take #10

comments.author: geophphreigh
comments.body: WONDERFUL! Super glad to have #9. Thank youGeophphreigh

comments.author: Humble Bitcoiners
comments.body: Congratulations to the Icarus Team. Well doneüòåWould appreciate to get #17 if possible Really looking forward what's coming nextGreetings Humble

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: I'll take #42 please This is a great idea, so if I understand there are 126 cards per quarter with 3 separate designs,each with 42 cards?congrats to mx12.levins on the collaboration, design and being the first to kick off this series.

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: aoluain on October 20, 2023, 07:59:52 PM‚úÇÔ∏èThis is a great idea, so if I understand there are 126 cards per quarter with 3 separate designs,each with 42 cards?‚úÇÔ∏èthat's right. 42 cards are released every month. and each quarter is always designed by one artist. so we end up with a total of 126 cards.thank you very much for the positive feedback and the orders so far

comments.author: Cyrus

comments.author: thiago007
comments.body: I would like number #25 please and I would also like to know if you will make the bronze, silver and gold ones or just these, thank you.

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: thiago007 on October 21, 2023, 03:18:48 AMI would like number #25 please and I would also like to know if you will make the bronze, silver and gold ones or just these, thank you.the timeline edition will only be produced in white cards. for the respective artists (who have contributed to the designs), there will be a golden variation (artist proof) as a gift

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: MrDipBuyer on October 22, 2023, 05:48:50 PM#8 (if priority doesn't take it)#24#33#88 (when available) #8 is reserved until haloxon answers and #88 is not available.do i understand correctly that you then order the two serials #24 and #33?

comments.author: MrDipBuyer
comments.body: I'd like to purchase #8 and #24 which is why I notated I'll take $8 if priority does not respond. If priority does respond I will instead buy #24 and #33Am I correct in that these cards are white plastic and not orange as shown in the photo?

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: MrDipBuyer on October 22, 2023, 09:09:49 PM‚úÇAm I correct in that these cards are white plastic and not orange as shown in the photo? the cards consist of white plastic in their original state and are then printed by us. depending on the design, the surface will of course change to the respective color.

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: all orders paid until today (except the one from @Cyrus) will be made ready for shipment today and shipped tomorrow. tracking i will then tell you tomorrow via the respective pm'sthank you for your orders so far!!!
